flawed_nl_solution:
Tony and Dean together read 23 + 12 = <<23+12=35>>35 books
3 of these books were duplicates so Tony and Dean together read 35 - 3 = <<35-3=23>>23 unique books
All three read 23 + 17 = <<23+17=40>>40 books
Because the books are being counted three times, the book is counted 3 - 1 = <<3-1=2>>2 extra times.
All together they have read 40 - 2 = <<40-2=38>>38 different books
#### 38

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
